title: Trump And Trudeau Act Out World’s Economic Drama
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: The media focus on personalities, but history records policies and policy shifts. That goes for this weekend’s G-7 summit, in which President Trump took umbrage at Prime Minister Trudeau’s news conference in which he declared that “Canadians will not be pushed around.” The drama we see performed today is bigger than any individual personalities and is signaling a policy direction – one of reduced international cooperation.
